Type.BattleDialog: Begin? Not seem weak. Caution?
Look tasty? Thought, not human.
Do you taste as disgusting as Sweepers?
Eat book? Could create fancier silk?
Must hurry along? Have Prescript to carry out.
…Did not taste too good.
Got ahead of yourself? Got done.
Sad? Long-time colleague has died.
Not dangerous yet? Fine so far.
Attacks were easy to read. Is easy?
Must get rid of quickly. Become nuisance?
Will not let such tiny humans get me.
Chance is now. Believe I can stab?
Seem strong? Won’t be problem.
Wonder how you taste? Look solid but delicious.
Excited? Won. Feel highly elated?
We are strong?
Cannot weave cloth anymore?
One of us defeated. Must think of way?
We will lose at this rate? Careful.
Must be cautious? Might get in serious trouble.
Can we eat book to produce new kind of silk?
Your strength won’t leave scratch on my body?
Not done yet. How many more to deal with?
Not like bullying? Cannot stand still and get hits all day.
Must do this for new silk?
Reduce unnecessary action. Race against time?
Not suffer heavy damage? But tired. Want rest?
All left is handing over goods to Index. Move quickly?
Cannot be? Have unfinished work…
Turned to book? Turn to book when dead.
Is fine. Might get bruised bad if not careful?
Is dangerous to get unruly and aggressive?
Caught one? Finished cleanly.
Look like we will win? Seem obvious.
Took down one. Should not be unguarded?
